  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addProductToCart(Product product)
    addItemToCart method called when the user clicks on the "Add to cart" button or when the user clicks on the + button if the product is not in the cart, it adds it to the cart with the quantity 1 if the product is in the cart, it increments the quantity of the product in the cart
    javafx.scene.layout.HBox
    createItemCard(CartItem cartItem)
    This method will be called on each ItemCart int the cart in the database It will return a HBox with the product name and the product quantity and price
    void
    GoToPayment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
     
    void
    initialize()
    initialize method Loads the cart from the database and displays it
    void
    removeProductFromCart(Product product)
    removeItemFromCart method called when the user clicks on the - if the product is in the cart, it removes it from the cart
    void
    updateAddress(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    updateAddrressButton method called when the user clicks on the "Update Address" button if the button label is "Update Address", and the addressInputField is not empty, it updates the delivery address of the cart and saves it in the database then change the text of the button to "Modify Address" if the button label is "Modify Address", it enables the addressInputField and change the text of the button to "Update Address"

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • addProductToCart

      public void addProductToCart(Product product) throws ParseException
      addItemToCart method called when the user clicks on the "Add to cart" button or when the user clicks on the + button if the product is not in the cart, it adds it to the cart with the quantity 1 if the product is in the cart, it increments the quantity of the product in the cart
      Throws:
      ParseException

    • removeProductFromCart

      public void removeProductFromCart(Product product) throws ParseException
      removeItemFromCart method called when the user clicks on the - if the product is in the cart, it removes it from the cart
      Throws:
      ParseException

    • createItemCard

      public javafx.scene.layout.HBox createItemCard(CartItem cartItem)
      This method will be called on each ItemCart int the cart in the database It will return a HBox with the product name and the product quantity and price
      Parameters:
      cartItem - the cartItem object

    • updateAddress

      public void updateAddress(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      updateAddrressButton method called when the user clicks on the "Update Address" button if the button label is "Update Address", and the addressInputField is not empty, it updates the delivery address of the cart and saves it in the database then change the text of the button to "Modify Address" if the button label is "Modify Address", it enables the addressInputField and change the text of the button to "Update Address"
